meanings.definition: The practice of making measurements from photographs.
meanings.sent1: In his research, he used photogrammetries to measure the distance between objects in the images.
meanings.sent2: Photogrammetries is essential in creating accurate maps from aerial photographs.
meanings.sent3: The detective solved the case by analyzing the photogrammetries of the crime scene photos.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to interpret photogrammetries was like deciphering a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The students were amazed by the precision of photogrammetries in determining the dimensions of the building.

meanings.definition: The science of making reliable measurements by means of photography.
meanings.sent1: Scientists rely on photogrammetries to ensure accurate measurements in their experiments.
meanings.sent2: The advancement of technology has greatly improved the accuracy of photogrammetries.
meanings.sent3: The children were fascinated by the concept of photogrammetries in their science class.
meanings.sent4: The precision of photogrammetries is comparable to the accuracy of a skilled mathematician.
meanings.sent5: The success of the project was attributed to the meticulous application of photogrammetries by the team.

meanings.definition: The technique of obtaining reliable measurements from photographs.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist used photogrammetries to document the ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: Photogrammetries plays a crucial role in preserving historical sites through accurate measurements.
meanings.sent3: The artist applied photogrammetries to capture the intricate details of the landscape.
meanings.sent4: The precision of photogrammetries allowed for the creation of a detailed 3D model.
meanings.sent5: The engineer utilized photogrammetries to analyze the structural integrity of the bridge.
